author: Scott Polacek
title: Jazz's Mike Conley Beats Chauncey Billups, Zach LaVine to Win NBA HORSE Contest
description: Mike Conley is the  NBA  champion.      The NBA H-O-R-S-E champion, that is.     Conley won the nationally televised competition organized by the league to    donate    more than ...
content:
Rick Bowmer/Associated Press
Mike Conley is the NBA champion.  
The NBA H-O-R-S-E champion, that is. 
Conley won the nationally televised competition organized by the league to donate more than $200,000 to charities and provide content during the coronavir… [+2816 chars]
